name: Me Girl Love Story - The Free 3D Dating & Fashion Game
name_original: Me Girl Love Story - The Free 3D Dating & Fashion Game
description:
Fall in love with Me Girl Love Story, a quirky 3D dating game!

There’s only one way to get to the top in this dating adventure! Unlock all of the guys to claim the title of best dating columnist in the city! Publish articles about your dates, work exciting assignments, play fun mini games, and shop for fabulous fashions!

Put your dating shoes on!
* DATE guys like the barista, a heroic knight, a billionaire and more!
* FLIRT to break the ice in a fun mini game
* MATCH 3 or more in a row to win his heart on a date
* PUBLISH quirky articles about the guy you’re dating
* SHOP for chic 3D styles

Can you date them all? Live the dream and play Me Girl Love Story now!

__________________________________
Payments FAQ:

Does Me Girl Love Story use in-game payments?
It's free to play Me Girl Love Story, and there is the option of purchasing extra in game cash or gems.
